articles.author: Canadian Press
articles.title: Ontario offers faster second COVID vaccine appointments to all youth 12+ - Bowen Island Undercurrent
articles.description: TORONTO — Ontario youth aged 12 to 17 were able to start booking accelerated second doses of their COVID-19 vaccines Monday as the government worked to boost immunization rates before school resumes in September. Appointments opened at 8 a.m.
